name: Cobi Busters
description:
Cobi Busters is a super fun, challenging strategy game for you and your friends to play in iMessage. Take turns placing your little cobi's on the lily pad's and see who can connect their sides first and win!

Cobi Busters, from the creators of the Cobi Arrows, Cobi Hoops and the smash-hit iOS games, iBomber and Red's Kingdom.

Where to find iMessage games after installing,
● Start a new Message to a friend
● Tap the App Store icon (above the keyboard)
● Tap the 4 dots (bottom left)
● Tap Cobi Busters icon or swipe left to find it

More
Discover more amazing Cobra Mobile games at www.cobramobile.com

Support
Having problems? Visit http://www.cobramobile.com/support/ to see if we can help you.
